mapper.select:
SELECT o.id as o_id, o.name as o_name,
c.id as c_id, c.name as c_name, c.description as c_description, c.creationdate as c_creationdate, c.status as c_status, c.modificationdate as c_modificationdate,
o.description as o_description, o.creationdate as o_creationdate, o.status as o_status, o.modificationdate as o_modificationdate,
u.id as u_id, u.name as u_name, u.password as u_password, u.email as u_email, u.status as u_status, u.numero_necesidades as u_numero_necesidades, u.numero_ofertas as u_numero_ofertas,
ut.id as ut_id, ut.name as ut_name, ut.description as ut_description
FROM offers o JOIN categories c ON o.category = c.id JOIN users u ON o.usuario = u.id JOIN usertypes ut ON u.usertype = ut.id WHERE o.id = #{id} ORDER BY o.id;
